Articles.Content:
I have an idea for KSP: Mission patches. You could change them for each mission (similar to flags) and they would appear on your Kerbal EVA suits, maybe on the shoulder.

What do you think about that?

Edited August 15, 2013 by Javster
Made post a tad longer
I'd be down for that. Pretty much any, little way to customize a mission or my kerbonauts, I'd be completely happy with.

Also, if, like has been suggested, a museum was implemented, you could see a list of all your mission patches.

The patches could also show up in the tracking station, and you could group ships into specific missions.
